name: Symmodance
description:
Step into a mesmerizing world of geometric chaos and rhythm with 'Symmodance,' an enthralling and adrenaline-fueled futuristic top-down 2D shooter that offers a unique twist on the reverse bullet hell genre. Embark on a thrilling adventure where you control a hovering platform armed with powerful weapons. As you navigate through intricate geometric shapes, battle hordes of foes, and engage in relentless action, your skills will be put to the ultimate test.




As you traverse the cosmos, put your reflexes and strategic prowess to the test in three distinct game modes, from the time-limited intensity of 'Classic Mode,' to the unending challenge of 'Endless Mode,' and the heart-pounding test of skill in 'Hardcore Mode.' As you defeat enemies, level up, and gather upgrade points, you'll experience the exhilaration of becoming a true symmodancing master.




Encounter relentless bosses, each with their own unique patterns and challenges, adding a layer of excitement and unpredictability to your journey.




Unlock a diverse arsenal of futuristic weapons, accumulate experience and upgrade chips to fine-tune your hovering platform's arsenal, ensuring you're equipped to tackle the intensifying geometric onslaught.



Make every run unique by picking up different augmentations and items, enhancing your abilities and adapting your playstyle to the ever-evolving challenges.



Discover a universe where your playstyle becomes your strategy, a realm where dodging and shooting blend seamlessly in an intricate dance. Are you prepared to embrace the symphony of bullets, geometry, and skill?

Step into the symmodancing world and showcase your mastery as the ultimate conductor of chaos and order. Unleash your tactical genius, conquer geometric adversaries, and allow the harmony of action and rhythm to lead every step. Add 'Symmodance' to your wishlist today and immerse yourself in a futuristic domain ruled by precision, rhythm, and strategy.
